question: In which year, Madan Lal Dhingra shot dead Curzon Wylie?
explanation: On 1 July 1909 , revolutionary Madan Lal Dhingra shot dead Curzon Wylie at London. Wylie was Political Aide-de-camp to the Secretary of State of India, and was head of the Secret Police. Dhingra was hanged on 17 August 1909.
